column6: "HEROES AND VILLIANS" PART 1 (OF 4) The Brotherhood of Mutants is back with Nocturne from the Exiles, and a surprise shocker of a member!
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | letterer:Rus Wooton
